Articles.Content: you get to low Kerbin orbit and make the applapses higher then the mun orbit and time warp intel you get an encounter and do your burn to orbit the mun.
Instead of wasting time and snacks in time warp, you can set up maneuver node to raise Ap to reach Mun orbit and then move node along current orbit till you get an intercept

General rule is; line the Mun up to about 2 o'clock from a burn start time (which would be at 6 o'clock).

 

There's an old wives' tale about waiting until the Mun is just appearing over the horizon and burning but, it's never worked for me.
